programme.title: 57th Golden Bell Awards Red Carpet Fashion (M)
programme.desc: Television Dramatic Golden Bell Awards 2022 is one of the annual events of the Taiwan media industry in 2022 to reward the outstanding Taiwanese television practitioners in 2022, with new categories and the separation of awards ceremonies for television shows and variety programs. Both Ruby Lin and Cheryl Yang have been nominated Best Actress at the Golden Bell Awards for their performances in Netflix's "Light the Night". Meanwhile, Chen Ya-lan, Taiwanese actress is nominated for Best Actor in Golden Bell Awards, this is a new breakthrough for Golden Bell Awards!

programme.title: Television Dramatic Golden Bell Awards 2022 (M)
programme.desc: Television Dramatic Golden Bell Awards 2022 is one of the annual events of the Taiwan media industry in 2022 to reward the outstanding Taiwanese television practitioners in 2022, with new categories and the separation of awards ceremonies for television shows and variety programs. Both Ruby Lin and Cheryl Yang have been nominated Best Actress at the Golden Bell Awards for their performances in Netflix's "Light the Night". Meanwhile, Chen Ya-lan, Taiwanese actress is nominated for Best Actor in Golden Bell Awards, this is a new breakthrough for Golden Bell Awards!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep751
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach his irresponsible daughter Jennifer some respect, her billionaire father pretends to disown her. He then hires Mario to pretend to be her driver and protect her. Just as the two start falling for each other, Jennifer’s father becomes very ill and she must take over his business. Will Jennifer and Mario’s budding romance continue?

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Who Killed Cock Robin
programme.desc: An ambitious journalist eagerly pursues a long-forgotten accident. When the sole survivor of the accident suddenly disappears, he realizes that nothing is what it seems, and the unimaginable dark truth will haunt him for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Dealer Healer
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Dealer Healer follows the story of Chen Hua, a former underworld kingpin and drug dealer, who takes a new lease of life and help rehabilitate people from drug addiction.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: Adam is upset after breaking up with Eva and has a drunken tryst with Mandy. He discovers Eva’s diary which recorded her 77 heartbreaking experiences with him. Adam finally realizes Eva is his true love and they resolve to start anew. However, when Eva stumbles across evidence of his affair with Mandy, will she be able to pardon him a 78th time?

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: A band of courageous bodyguards is tasked with escorting the daughter of general, the concubine of the recently deceased Ming emperor Wu Sangui, and her son, who is the last hope of the Ming Dynasty, to safety.

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. Starting afresh, he begins to assemble a group of children to compete in the Latin dance competition. But can Yu, still facing his own insecurities, bring out the best in these children and let them shine on stage?

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various “human experiments” and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Demon Of The Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: In this charming live-action adaptation of the beloved Old Master Q aka Mr Funny-bone, he and his sidekick, Mr. Potato get tangled in love when Mr Funny-bone falls head over heels in love with a dashing lady.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend “Investiture of the Gods”, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat’s knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit…

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun’s plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it…

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their daughter Ling Yun, the eldest son Ling Hsiao, and a young artist Hsu, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Hui picks up a purple shell and gives it to Ha as a momento. When her husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while he also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: Commissioner Liu Ta-hua (Tsao Ta-hua) is arrested by special envoy Cheng Chih-cheng (Wang Jung) for corruption. Coolie Lin Szu-hai (Gordon Liu Chia-hui), who has unintentionally helped Cheng, is given a small post under Lo. Lin is smart and soon learns how to get dockside bribes. Later, he gets a regular spin-off from Adjutant Chang…

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: This is the sequel to The Mad Monk, which was made in 1977 by director Li Han-hsiang and starring Yeh Feng. Striking again alongside The Mad Monk (Yeh Feng) is equally legendary Lu Tung-pin (Hua Lun), the immortal scholar-turned-genie. The duo wreck havoc as they vie with one another be it mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
programme.desc: Goutham grows up hating women after his mother abandons him during his childhood. Though he decides to stay single while his friends marry, Priya changes his mind about singlehood.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Aan Devathai
programme.desc: Difficulties arise when Elango and Jessie, a married couple and parents of twins, decide to lead separate lives owing to an ugly fight.

programme.title: Brother'S Day
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Sreekaram
programme.desc: Karthik, a young IT professional, works in a reputed firm and earns a hefty salary. However, he soon quits his job in order to pursue farming and promote agriculture among the youth.

programme.title: Sathura Adi 3500
programme.desc: Karuna, a police officer, sets out to investigate the suspicious death of a young man, Stephen. But trouble begins when he gets terrorised by Stephen's ghost.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends, with their new boss Gouravam, come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant. Their plans get messed up when Saravanan falls for Aishwarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Maapla Singam
programme.desc: Mapla Singam is a rural comedy about two families in a village that are in constant conflict with each other.

programme.title: Devi 2
programme.desc: Devi starts suspecting her husband, Krishna, of infidelity when she notices him with two other women. However, she unearths a horrifying truth when she decides to investigate.

programme.title: Junga
programme.desc: Junga is involved in a fight, because of which his family loses the theatre that they own. In order to get it back, he devises a plan that takes him to Paris, where he fights a criminal gang.

programme.title: Desingu Raja
programme.desc: A love story with boy and girl from feuding villages.

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Vasu and his friends take a vow to never marry to keep their friendship intact. However, when Vasu falls in love with Deepika, his friends decide to ruin his affair.

programme.title: Balle Valleyatheva
programme.desc: Sakthi moves to a new village after his mother, who is a postmaster, gets transferred. He befriends a childless couple and falls in love with Thanikodi, a butcher's daughter.

programme.title: Vaa Arugil Vaa
programme.desc: An unlucky young woman is married off to a man who thinks she is from a rich family. The groom's family tries everything to throw her out of the house.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Danny
programme.desc: After the police inspector Kunthavai picks up a complex murder case for investigation, she takes the help of Danny, a smart police dog, to unearth a gang of dangerous criminals involved in serial killing.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Inji Iduppazhagi
programme.desc: Sweety, an obese woman, joins a slimming centre but is horrified to witness the effects of the medicines they prescribe. She starts a campaign to stress the importance of being fit rather than slim.

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Veeram The Power Man
programme.desc: Vinayagam lives with his four brothers and they often get into trouble with the law. When he falls in love with a girl named Koppu, he decides to mend his ways for her.

programme.title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
programme.desc: A gangster plans to take over the country by replacing the president with a lookalike. A man and woman, who are complete strangers, get wind of this conspiracy and try to save the country.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Real Winner
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Chaahat
programme.desc: When Roop comes to the city for his father's medical treatment, he falls for Pooja and proposes to her. However, when a spoilt Reshma falls for him, she turns crazy and tries to own him.

programme.title: Aa Dekhen Zara
programme.desc: Photographer Ray Acharya, who has not seen much of success considering his potential, inherits a magical camera from his grandfather that transforms his life completely.

programme.title: Fight Club: Members Only
programme.desc: Four friends decide to start an underground club that lets youngsters fight against each other for money. However, things take a turn after a man gets killed and they are charged with the crime.

programme.title: Meera
programme.desc: After Meera marries Rana Bhojraj to strengthen the ties between their clans, her husband learns about the man she loves. In response, he asks her to commit the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: I Am 24
programme.desc: Hilarity ensues when a middle-aged man falls in love with a younger woman and tries to woo her by pretending to be a younger man.

programme.title: Mera Dost Hanuman
programme.desc: Lord Hanuman descends on Earth to help his devotees, Chandar and Sugna, fight against the evil forces that are trying to harm their children.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Judaai
programme.desc: To honour his late father's will, Shashikant and Gauri get married and soon have a son. However, marital problems arise when she starts suspecting him of having an affair with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Mental
programme.desc: A young boy, who is jailed for killing his mother's murderers, realizes the power of the uniform and grows up into a ruthless but honest cop. Trouble arises when he locks horns with a powerful goon.

programme.title: Mental
programme.desc: A young boy, who is jailed for killing his mother's murderers, realizes the power of the uniform and grows up into a ruthless but honest cop. Trouble arises when he locks horns with a powerful goon.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: ...Aur Pyaar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Ashi travels to Switzerland to meet the suitor she is supposed to marry. However, in a case of mistaken identity, she meets another man and soon begins to fall for him.

programme.title: Ghar Ho To Aisa
programme.desc: Amar's mother rules her house like a dictator and tortures her daughter-in-law, Sharda. After Sharda and her daughter die, Amar decides to teach his cruel family a lesson with the help of Seema.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Cady Heron is a cultural blank slate when she first sets foot on the grounds of North Shore High School in a small town outside of Chicago, Illinois. After living in Africa, Cady has no idea how "wild" things can be in civilization until she crosses paths with one of the meanest species of all, the "Queen Bee," who at this school is the cool and calculating Regina George. But Cady doesn't just cross paths with this Queen Bee--she really stings her when she falls for Regina's ex-boyfriend Aaron Samuels. Now Regina is set to sting back by pretending to still like Aaron so he won't go out with Cady, all the while pretending to be her friend. With no choice but to use the same M.O. to stay in the game, the "Girl World" one-upmanship escalates until the entire school gets dragged into a first-class mean-fest.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Born as an 80-year-old man in New Orleans just after World War I, Benjamin Button proceeds to grow younger as time passes. And unable to stop time like any other man, Benjamin experiences life and love oddly out of sync with the rest of humanity. This Academy Award winning film is a time traveller's tale of the people and places Benjamin encounters, the loves he loses and finds, as well as the joys of life and the sadness of death and what lasts beyond time.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Humans - Humans are changing our planet so rapidly, it's affecting earth's life support systems: our weather, our oceans and the living world.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sun: God Star - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep5
programme.desc: There's a waterfall of chocolate at a California candy factory; meet the saucy squad behind mountains of cannelloni; find out what it takes to make rice noodles by the truckload; and a hardworking team takes the hassle out of preparing butternut squash.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep6
programme.desc: From tree to bottle, follow the amazing story of maple syrup; there's a 'tower of power' behind a delectable Almond Roca butter toffee popcorn; a British Columbia candy company is giving Turkish Delight a thoroughly modern twist; and find out the secret behind apples that taste like grapes.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the glorious Lake District National Park and the county of Cumbria. With its magnificent mountains, glacial valleys and 16 iconic lakes and meres, the Lake District is one of the great natural wonders of our country.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep3
programme.desc: From everyday items to outer space: Victorinox Swiss Army knife, Heinz baked beans and Japan's KitKat, plus NASA's SLS, soon to be heading out of this world.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep7
programme.desc: It takes 80,000 apples to produce a single batch of fruit leather; discover the secret to making squeaky cheese curds; Hello Dolly bars are getting a vegan encore; and there's a fun-loving pit crew behind every tub of a Canadian guacamole.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep8
programme.desc: See the chocolate factory behind exotic truffles; eco-friendly coffee pods combine guilt-free caffeine with all the convenience; 250,000 gyoza dumplings roll off the assembly line every day; and meet the inventor of Moon Cheese.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing Our Planet S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Revive Our Oceans - Prince William and Earthshot Prize Council members Sir David Attenborough and singer Shakira discover how we are damaging the oceans, and they discuss inspiring projects across the world that have found ways to revive ocean life. Prince William introduces us to the finalists for the Earthshot Prize to Revive Our Oceans.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep3
programme.desc: A once in a generation eruption on a volcanic island. In the United States, heavy rain and snow melt submerge a town and in Italy, giant hail pulls up pavements, and traps drivers in their cars.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.desc: The Sun: God Star - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Blue Planet II S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Green Seas - From enchanted kelp forests to undersea prairies, the planet's green seas teem with life. They are the most abundant but fiercely competitive places in the ocean to live.

programme.desc: Frozen Planet returns with a spellbinding journey through magical icy lands. Worlds of surprising variety and beauty - seemingly untouched by human presence, it's this isolation that makes these places so special.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In early May China enters a new solar term "Start of Summer". In Guizhou, scientists working on the FAST telescope are discovering new pulsars frequently.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Memoirs of Acacia Ep1
programme.desc: Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years’ worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Ivory Wars Ep2
programme.desc: Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Horses of the Sun Ep3
programme.desc: Grévy’s zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we aren’t vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Stripes of Serima Ep4
programme.desc: The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevy’s zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattle’s grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Crocs and Hippos of Ndumo Ep6
programme.desc: The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africa’s amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Memoirs of Acacia Ep1
programme.desc: Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - The Enemies Within Ep5
programme.desc: Vet Batian is leaving Ol Pejeta after six years and he's organizing his team for one last action: a massive translocation of three species—about 500 animals. But when things go wrong, the staff is forced to come up with plan B.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - Crossing the Danakil Ep1
programme.desc: The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Child of Fire Ep2
programme.desc: For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers Ep1
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 - Trials of Olimba Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earth’s oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Ivory Wars Ep2
programme.desc: Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Invasion Begins Ep1
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad’s brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Gates of Hell Ep3
programme.desc: Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Fires of Pele Ep4
programme.desc: The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the region’s species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Carnivores of the Coral Garden Ep1
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Magicians of the Reef Ep2
programme.desc: Arabia’s coral reefs are home to some of nature’s most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Gates of Hell Ep3
programme.desc: Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Sight Ep1
programme.desc: Vision – it’s how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Carnivores of the Coral Garden Ep1
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Magicians of the Reef Ep2
programme.desc: Arabia’s coral reefs are home to some of nature’s most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Island Feast Ep3
programme.desc: Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just can’t resist.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep14
programme.desc: Rollodons - When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big In Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lost Park - When Audrey's big sister, Zoe, and her friends take over the park, Audrey needs all the Harvey Kids to help beat the bigger kids.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Mall Walkers / Treasured Tattoo - Archibald stumbles upon a crime in progress while trapped in the mall overnight. A whale's tattooed map inspires Archibald to go on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep40
programme.desc: Friend Like Tip / Like Mother, Like Pit Of Fire - Tip meets a surprisingly similar girl which threatens Tip's uniqueness/ When Tip and Die-Anne refuse to "be like their moms", they end up finding themselves in a dangerous situation

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey To The East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep16
programme.desc: Paradise Found - Sometimes you land on an unexplored planet and wonderful, magical things happen. Then after a while you’re like, wait, is something wrong? Yes, something is definitely wrong.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Fast And The Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep40
programme.desc: The All Hail King Julien Show - King Julien launches a new TV channel called “Julien-Vision” but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Tenuous Takedown Of The Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep14
programme.desc: As The Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep14
programme.desc: Pigs - Toby's ninja brother Brandt returns to San Lorenzo, and Puss agrees to help him reunite with his brothers – to get them out of town.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep15
programme.desc: Scrambled Eggs/George Stephenson - Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Rupert’S Bird’S Eye View - Rupert and Bill wish they could see more from the Tree House Telescope so Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to give them a better view. Unfortunately the magic is more powerful than they expect and the Telescope Platform, with Rupert and Bill on board, detaches itself and flies off to find a better view. At first, Rupert and Bill are excited to be flying about, but then the Telescope begins to cause trouble, first landing on Ping Pong's Pagoda, then heading to Rocky Bay where it lands on the Lighthouse to enjoy the sea view. By now, Rupert and Bill, who cannot get down, want to go home and the Lighthouse Keeper is beside himself. The Telescope Platform is blocking the Lighthouse light and with night approaching it will be a disaster if they cannot get the Platform to go back to the Tree House.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Rupert And The Memory Man - The friends don't know what to do when a spell goes wrong and Edward loses his memory. Although Raggety summons up the Memory Man to show Edward some exciting memories from his past he still can't remember anything until Rupert gives him one of his very favourite things: an apple…..

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep35
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Perfect Present - Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends… but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep36
programme.desc: Raa Raa The Copycat - Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends… but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep87
programme.desc: Just One Hornetto - Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep88
programme.desc: Wasps - Stingo is very depressed. All the tots have noticed it. They decide to organise a very special "wasp" surprise for Stingo.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Today The Dog, Tomorrow The World - Today the Dog, Tomorrow the World Power-mad Alien Empress Miasma takes control of Gnasher from the inside and uses him in her attempts to take over planet Earth. But when Miasma breaks out of Gnasher into Beanotown for real and Walter helps her grow in size, mayhem really takes hold!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep36
programme.desc: School Of Croc - Dennis and the gang help Walter’s pampered ex-pet croc, Crunchzilla to get in touch with his wild side. Walter does his best to thwart them, as he needs to keep the Croc tame in the hope of retrieving his Father’s limo keys, which CrunchZilla has swallowed.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep18
programme.desc: Eye Of The Storm - Team Voltron seeks to rest and recharge on the surface of an ice planet

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep18
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter One - While celebrating their friend-iversary at their favorite restaurant, Long Tom Lobster’s, Rocky and Bullwinkle solve a seemingly impossible maze on the kids’ menu.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep15
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Compst Elf / Meet Ya At The Stump - The streets get trashy when Archibald misinforms folks about compost. Archibald and his pals rally when their favorite hangout is threatened.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Frantic Fury Of The Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse Of The Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math/Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip'S Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girl’s plans to attend the Governor’s Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair… lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist – but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What'S Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.desc: Dottle Rocket / Weekend At Audrey'S - Dot's model rocket goes up but doesn't come down. Audrey accidentally breaks Lotta's virtual pet, but pretends it's still alive.
